mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREEBOARD WHERE F_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT a.F_BOARD_NO, a.F_BULLET, a.F_BOARD_TITLE, b.MEMBER_NAME AS "F_WRITER", a.ENROLL_DATE, a.HITS FROM FREEBOARD a JOIN MEMBER b USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE F_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY F_BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT a.F_BOARD_NO, a.F_BULLET, a.F_BOARD_TITLE, a.F_BOARD_CONTENTS, b.MEMBER_NAME AS "F_WRITER", a.ENROLL_DATE, a.HITS FROM FREEBOARD a JOIN MEMBER b USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE F_BOARD_NO = #{fBoardNo} AND F_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD(F_BOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID, F_BULLET, F_BOARD_TITLE, F_BOARD_CONTENTS, ENROLL_DATE, HITS, F_STATUS) VALUES(FBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{fBullet}, #{fBoardTitle }, #{fBoardContents }, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO FREEBOARD_FILE (FILE_NO, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, UPLOAD_DATE, F_BOARD_NO) VALUES(FBOARD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{originalFilename}, #{renameFilename}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE, FBOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT a.CMT_NO, a.CMT_CONTENTS, a.ENROLL_DATE, b.MEMBER_NAME AS "CMT_WRITER" FROM FREEBOARD_CMT a JOIN MEMBER b USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE F_BOARD_NO = #{fBoardNo} AND CMT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CMT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD_CMT VALUES(FBOARD_CMT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cmtContents}, SYSDATE, #{fBoardNo}, #{memberId}, DEFAULT)
